org.apache.flink.api.common.io

类 FileOutputFormat<IT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichOutputFormat<IT>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.FileOutputFormat<IT>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, CleanupWhenUnsuccessful, InitializeOnMaster, OutputFormat<IT>
    直接已知子类:
    AvroOutputFormat, BinaryOutputFormat, CsvOutputFormat, ScalaCsvOutputFormat, TextOutputFormat

    @Public
public abstract class FileOutputFormat<IT>
extends RichOutputFormat<IT>
implements InitializeOnMaster, CleanupWhenUnsuccessful
    The abstract base class for all Rich output formats that are file based. Contains the logic to open/close the target file streams.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 方法详细资料

      • initDefaultsFromConfiguration

        private static void initDefaultsFromConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
        Initialize defaults for output format. Needs to be a static method because it is configured for local cluster execution, see LocalFlinkMiniCluster.
        参数:
        configuration - The configuration to load defaults from

      • setOutputFilePath

        public void setOutputFilePath(Path path)

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration parameters)
        从接口复制的说明: OutputFormat
        Configures this output format. Since output formats are instantiated generically and hence parameterless, this method is the place where the output formats set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated output format.

        指定者:
        configure 在接口中 OutputFormat<IT>
        参数:
        parameters - The configuration with all parameters.

      • open

        public void open(int taskNumber,
                 int numTasks)
          throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: OutputFormat
        Opens a parallel instance of the output format to store the result of its parallel instance.

        When this method is called, the output format it guaranteed to be configured.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 OutputFormat<IT>
        参数:
        taskNumber - The number of the parallel instance.
        numTasks - The number of parallel tasks.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the output could not be opened due to an I/O problem.

      • getDirectoryFileName

        protected java.lang.String getDirectoryFileName(int taskNumber)

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: OutputFormat
        Method that marks the end of the life-cycle of parallel output instance. Should be used to close channels and streams and release resources. After this method returns without an error, the output is assumed to be correct.

        When this method is called, the output format it guaranteed to be opened.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 OutputFormat<IT>
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the input could not be closed properly.

      • initializeGlobal

        public void initializeGlobal(int parallelism)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Initialization of the distributed file system if it is used.
        指定者:
        initializeGlobal 在接口中 InitializeOnMaster
        参数:
        parallelism - The task parallelism.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - The initialization may throw exceptions, which may cause the job to abort.

      • tryCleanupOnError

        public void tryCleanupOnError()
        从接口复制的说明: CleanupWhenUnsuccessful
        Hook that is called upon an unsuccessful execution.
        指定者:
        tryCleanupOnError 在接口中 CleanupWhenUnsuccessful
